# Calling SQL Server from R {.tabset}

```{r}
library(RODBC)
host<-"Insufficientdata.northeurope.cloudapp.azure.com"
db<-"AdventureWorks2016CTP3"
uname<-"Rdemo"
pwd<-"SQLbits16!"
connstring<-sprintf("Driver={ODBC Driver 13 for SQL Server};Server=%1$s;
Database=%2$s;Uid=%3$s;Pwd=%4$s;",host,db,uname,pwd)

conn<-odbcDriverConnect(connstring)
sqlTables(conn,schema = "dbo")
```
